name: Forest Spider
description: A large, hairy spider with glistening black eyes and sharp fangs. Its web glistens with dewdrops in the dim forest light. It moves with surprising speed and agility.

attacks.name: Venomous Bite
attacks.description: The spider lunges forward with its fangs dripping venom!

attacks.name: Web Strike
attacks.description: The spider shoots a sticky web and strikes with its legs!

attacks.name: Quick Skitter
attacks.description: The spider darts forward with lightning speed!
